Es ist schwer zu sagen das dieses Spiel gut ist oder Schlecht.

Schlecht ist es in dem Sinne es sind ein haufen Cheater unterwegs und gefühlt nur Russen was ein zusammen spielen unmöglich macht. 

Gut? schwer zu sagen, Hat man ein Team macht es sicherlich Spaß aber auch sowas ist schwer zu finden irgendwo anschluss zu finden. Gefühlt war das vor 10 jahren alles leichter xD
Tahle hra je na hovno, kvůli report systému, ten kdo to vymyslel, tak měl asi mozek v prdeli.

I'm a boomer who played this game since 1.5, if you ask me this game is the king of tactical shooters and it will be always the golden standard.

Pros:
Quality of life improvements
Nice graphic, running well on a low-cost computer
Game is intense if you know how-to play.

Cons:
Community still toxic
Best played with friends

This is a very cool and addictive game, it is very enjoyable and cool to play, especially when you do it with your friends. A very kind and pleasant community, everyone around wants you to live a long and happy life. They also often remember your mom, maybe someone was familiar with her, but there are definitely not many people. It also happens that the guys with whom you play are a little nervous and from that the game becomes tense, but these are trifles.
